properties.name: sms.from
properties.description: The phone number to send the SMS from

properties.name: sms.to
properties.description: The phone number to send the SMS to

properties.name: sms.sid
properties.description: The SID for the Twilio account that will be used to send the message

properties.name: sms.token
properties.description: The authentication token for the Twilio account that will be used to send the message
